summary: Adds a cave/basement to Honeyside with a Nightingale theme. \"Nocturnal Forge\" and smithing equipment is available for use.
descriptionHtml:
Update 2.0 - Cave expansion
     - Smelter
     - 2 new player chests
     - Chopping Block
     - Door to Ragged Flaggon
     - Navmesh fixes, NPC\'s no longer get stuck

Trainees 2.0 - Nightingales have more freedom to explore the newly added space and the 1st floor of Honeyside.  They eat, sleep, smith, smelt, etc. 

This plug-in adds a Nightingale/Nocturnal themed basement to Honeyside complete with \"Nocturnal Forge\", Grindwheel, Workbench, Tanning Rack, and Cooking Spit.  No need to zone as this is built onto and part of the Honeyside cell.

Install:
Add NightingaleBasement plug-in to C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

Unintall:
Remove NightingaleBasement plug-in from C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

Optional
Nightingales!  The optional Trainees plug in add\'s 3 Nightingales to the cave to tend the equipment and make it feel a little less lonely.  Install/Uninstall is the same as above.

I recommend my Freeroam Housecarls plug-in to accompany this.  It will allow Iona to wonder down to the cave and use the equipment as well.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11551
My Other Nightingale Mod
Nightingale Dock
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11563
author: reggert
